events.title: Attack on Pearl Harbor
events.description: The Japanese military launched a surprise attack on the United States naval base at Pearl Harbor, Hawaii, leading to the United States' entry into World War II.
events.significance: This attack marked a turning point in WWII by bringing the US into the conflict, significantly impacting the course of the war and global history.

events.title: Delaware becomes the first U.S. state
events.description: Delaware ratified the United States Constitution, becoming the first state to join the newly formed United States of America.
events.significance: Delaware's ratification was pivotal in establishing the United States as a unified nation under the Constitution.

events.title: Apollo 17 returns to Earth
events.description: Apollo 17, the last manned mission to the Moon of NASA's Apollo program, returned safely to Earth after a successful mission including lunar exploration and scientific experiments.
events.significance: It marked the end of the Apollo lunar missions and expanded human knowledge of the Moon.
